subjective.comment: Subjective information provided by the patient.

objective.comment: Objective findings from physical examination and diagnostic tests.

assessment.comment: Doctor's assessment based on subjective and objective information. If not suggested, return None

tests_to_be_taken.comment: List of additional diagnostic tests to be conducted for further assessment. If not suggested, return blank list.

other_next_steps.comment: Other necessary actions before finalizing the patient's treatment plan. If not suggested, return blank list.

prescription.comment: List Medication suggested by doctor including names, dosages, frequencies, routes, durations, and special instructions. If not suggested, return blank list.

medications.med_name: string for name or brand of medicine suggested else empty
medications.frequency: string for frequency to take the medicine if suggested else empty
medications.time_of_day: string for time of the day when to take the medicine if suggested else empty
medications.dosages: string for dosage if suggested else empty
medications.duration: string for duration and refill if suggested else empty
medications.instructions: string for how to take the medication if suggested else empty
